metadata.title: CVE-2018-17795 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The function t2p_write_pdf in tiff2pdf.c in LibTIFF 4.0.9 and earlierallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based bufferoverflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impactvia a crafted TIFF file, a similar issue to CVE-2017-9935.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17795` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.4
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.4
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.4
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.4').
